vocabulary.definition: a thick cover used for warmth (cobija)
to move upward using hands and feet (trepar)
a small storage space for clothes (armario)
to place something over another thing (cubrir)
to go down or lose balance (caer)
a container used to drink liquids (vaso)
to make someone or something quiet (silenciar)
